# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "tbeam;tbeam0.7;heltec;tlora-v1;tlora-v2;tlora-v2-1-1.6;cubecellplus;nrf52840dk;nrf52840dk-geeksville;feather_nrf52832;rak815;ppr;ppr1;eink;eink0.1;lora-relay-v1;lora-relay-v2;native;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-format -Os -O0 -w -Wall -ggdb -DAPP_VERSION=1.2.10")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-format -Os -O0 -w -Wall -ggdb -DAPP_VERSION=1.2.10")


if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "native")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'FIXMEFLAG')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=4403')
    add_definitions(-D'PORTDUINO')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-portduino/libraries/WiFi/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/native/Crypto")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/native/Thread")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/native/OneButton/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-portduino/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-portduino/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tbeam0.7")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_T_Beam')
    add_definitions(-D'BOARD_HAS_PSRAM')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'LOG_LOCAL_LEVEL=ESP_LOG_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'AXP_DEBUG_PORT=Serial')
    add_definitions(-D'TBEAM_V07')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"t-beam\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"TTGO T-Beam\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESPmDNS/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Update/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SPIFFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FS/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/esp32")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "heltec")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_HELTEC_WIFI_LORA_32_V2')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'LOG_LOCAL_LEVEL=ESP_LOG_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'AXP_DEBUG_PORT=Serial')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"heltec_wifi_lora_32_V2\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"Heltec WiFi LoRa 32 \(V2\)\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/fb_gfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/cores/esp32")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/variants/heltec_wifi_lora_32_V2")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/BluetoothOTA")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/OneButton@0.0.0-alpha+sha.eb583d713a/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/RadioLib@src-04c34ef49d4ad9f955bfeccb187cbfb4/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/RadioLib@src-73ec3f00ee50ec53c3e35f8f57cb805b/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/RadioLib@src-7defea5cd18ca13be529349922fbc9bd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-8ce11c31a386d7fec113d205dac8fee5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-c2b16aac179b750f0dd483f91954d27c/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ArduinoOTA/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AzureIoT/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BluetoothSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESP32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FFat/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPClient/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/NetBIOS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD_MMC/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFiClientSecure/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0/xtensa-esp32-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/heltec/*.*
    )
endif()

    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_TTGO_LoRa32_V1')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'LOG_LOCAL_LEVEL=ESP_LOG_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'AXP_DEBUG_PORT=Serial')
    add_definitions(-D'TLORA_V1')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tlora-v1/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AsyncUDP/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/AzureIoT/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BluetoothSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESP32/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FFat/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/HTTPUpdate/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/NetBIOS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SD_MMC/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Ticker/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFiClientSecure/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include/c++/5.2.0/xtensa-esp32-elf")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/lib/gcc/xtensa-esp32-elf/5.2.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-xtensa32/xtensa-esp32-elf/include")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tlora-v1/*.*

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tlora-v2")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_TTGO_LoRa32_V1')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'LOG_LOCAL_LEVEL=ESP_LOG_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'AXP_DEBUG_PORT=Serial')
    add_definitions(-D'TLORA_V2')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"ttgo-lora32-v1\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"TTGO LoRa32-OLED V1\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/ESPmDNS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/DNSServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WebServer/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/WiFi/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SimpleBLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Preferences/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/BLE/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/Update/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/SPIFFS/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/libraries/FS/src")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tlora-v2/*.*

endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tlora-v2-1-1.6")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_TTGO_LoRa32_V1')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'LOG_LOCAL_LEVEL=ESP_LOG_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'CORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG')
    add_definitions(-D'AXP_DEBUG_PORT=Serial')
    add_definitions(-D'TLORA_V2_1_16')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ESP_PLATFORM')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=240000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'HAVE_CONFIG_H')
    add_definitions(-D'MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_VARIANT=\"ttgo-lora32-v1\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BOARD=\"TTGO LoRa32-OLED V1\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/protobuf-c")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/pthread")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/sdmmc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoespressif32/tools/sdk/include/smartconfig_ack")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tlora-v2-1-1.6/*.*
    )

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "nrf52840dk")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_PCA10056')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4404')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"nrf52840dk\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Nordic Semi\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/pca10056")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")

    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S113')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S113')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4404')

    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Nordic Semi\"')

    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/CRC32/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/pca10056-rc-clock")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s113_nrf52_7.2.0_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s113_nrf52_7.2.0_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/pca10056-rc-clock")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/OneButton@0.0.0-alpha+sha.eb583d713a/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/RadioLib@src-73ec3f00ee50ec53c3e35f8f57cb805b/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/RadioLib@src-7defea5cd18ca13be529349922fbc9bd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/RadioLib@src-9f0ee4ef0997cdc8a439cbeb678d52cd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-c2b16aac179b750f0dd483f91954d27c/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nrf52840dk-geeksville/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "feather_nrf52832")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52832_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52832')
    add_definitions(-D'S132')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S132')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x8029')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"Feather nRF52832 Express\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Adafruit\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s132_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s132_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/feather_nrf52832")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/feather_nrf52832/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "rak815")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52832_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52832')
    add_definitions(-D'S132')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S132')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x10c4')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0xea60')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"RAK815\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"RAK\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s132_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s132_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/rak815")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/rak815/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "ppr")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_PPR')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4403')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"PPR\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Othernet\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/UC1701/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/ppr")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-c2b16aac179b750f0dd483f91954d27c/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")

    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')

    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52833')
    add_definitions(-D'S113')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S113')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')

    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4406')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/ppr1")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/ppr")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/UC1701/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/ppr1/*.*
