if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "eink")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_TTGO_EINK')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'BUSY_PIN=3')
    add_definitions(-D'RST_PIN=2')
    add_definitions(-D'DC_PIN=28')
    add_definitions(-D'CS_PIN=30')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4405')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"TTGO_eink\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"TTGO\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/TFT_eSPI")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/EPD_Libraries/epd1in54")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/eink")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/eink")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/OneButton@0.0.0-alpha+sha.eb583d713a/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/RadioLib@src-73ec3f00ee50ec53c3e35f8f57cb805b/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/RadioLib@src-9f0ee4ef0997cdc8a439cbeb678d52cd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-c2b16aac179b750f0dd483f91954d27c/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "eink0.1")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_TTGO_EINK')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'BUSY_PIN=3')
    add_definitions(-D'RST_PIN=2')
    add_definitions(-D'DC_PIN=28')
    add_definitions(-D'CS_PIN=30')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4405')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"TTGO_eink\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"TTGO\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/TFT_eSPI")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/EPD_Libraries/epd1in54")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/eink0.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/eink0.1")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/eink0.1/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "lora-relay-v1")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_LORA_RELAY_V1')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'USER_SETUP_LOADED')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_WIDTH=80')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_HEIGHT=160')
    add_definitions(-D'ST7735_GREENTAB160x80')
    add_definitions(-D'ST7735_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_CS=ST7735_CS')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_DC=ST7735_RS')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_RST=ST7735_RESET')
    add_definitions(-D'SPI_FREQUENCY=27000000')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4404')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"LORA_RELAY\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"BigCorvus\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/TFT_eSPI")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/SparkFun BQ27441 LiPo Fuel Gauge Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/lora_relay_v1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/lora_relay_v1")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Adafruit BusIO")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Adafruit GFX Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Adafruit ST7735 and ST7789 Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Adafruit seesaw Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/OneButton@0.0.0-alpha+sha.eb583d713a/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib@src-04c34ef49d4ad9f955bfeccb187cbfb4/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib@src-73ec3f00ee50ec53c3e35f8f57cb805b/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib@src-7defea5cd18ca13be529349922fbc9bd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib@src-9f0ee4ef0997cdc8a439cbeb678d52cd/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/SD")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-8ce11c31a386d7fec113d205dac8fee5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library@src-c2b16aac179b750f0dd483f91954d27c/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Thread@src-2d5aa05a470baa9e9e00a0bae2a87c62")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/arduino-fsm@src-4bf5152e2f279002470ccf60d567d9e6")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v1/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "lora-relay-v2")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50100')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52840_LORA_RELAY_V2')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840_XXAA')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION_')
    add_definitions(-D'HW_VERSION=')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_THREAD_NAMES')
    add_definitions(-D'TINYGPS_OPTION_NO_CUSTOM_FIELDS')
    add_definitions(-D'USER_SETUP_LOADED')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_WIDTH=80')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_HEIGHT=160')
    add_definitions(-D'ST7735_GREENTAB160x80')
    add_definitions(-D'ST7735_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_CS=ST7735_CS')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_DC=ST7735_RS')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_RST=ST7735_RESET')
    add_definitions(-D'SPI_FREQUENCY=27000000')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_WR=ST7735_SDA')
    add_definitions(-D'TFT_SCLK=ST7735_SCK')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=64000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10804')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_NRF52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_BSP_VERSION=\"0.21.0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_FEATHER52')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_NRF52_ADAFRUIT')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_SERIES')
    add_definitions(-D'LFS_NAME_MAX=64')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52840')
    add_definitions(-D'S140')
    add_definitions(-D'NRF52_S140')
    add_definitions(-D'SOFTDEVICE_PRESENT')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_TINYUSB')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x4406')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"LORA_RELAY\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"BigCorvus\"')
    add_definitions(-D'CFG_DEBUG=0')
    add_definitions(-D'__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Bluefruit52Lib/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/InternalFileSytem/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Adafruit_LittleFS/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/TFT_eSPI")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/SparkFun BQ27441 LiPo Fuel Gauge Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/Thread")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/AXP202X_Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/TinyGPSPlus/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/RadioLib/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SoftwareSerial")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/SparkFun Ublox Arduino Library/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/arduino-fsm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/CRC32/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/OneButton/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/ESP8266_SSD1306/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/SPI")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Wire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/mesh")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/gps")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/nanopb/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/nrf52")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/sdk-nrfxlib/crypto/nrf_oberon/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/variants/lora_relay_v2")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/cmsis/Core/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/hal")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/mdk")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/soc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/nrfx/drivers/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/nordic/softdevice/s140_nrf52_6.1.1_API/include/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/Source/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/config")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/GCC/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/freertos/portable/CMSIS/nrf52")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/SEGGER")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/sysview/Config")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5/TinyUSB/Adafruit_TinyUSB_ArduinoCore/tinyusb/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/cores/nRF5")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/variants/lora_relay_v2")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/ESP8266_SSD1306@src-4ab3ad976e5f12b4a61f839d23a3c46d/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/RadioLib@src-eaad48fc571e663359162082157944f2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/Thread@src-a2b7660c81ffe1635912fa2f065bc3ce")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/TinyGPSPlus@src-2765db9a05cb947ced769bf56fedd1f5/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/TinyGPSPlus@src-addcdb46757d61b29d61d7a3c8d2c6aa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/arduino-fsm@src-47e2e1a833a6aba34dc6f0811d801e49")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEAdafruitService/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/BLEHomekit/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/PDM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/RotaryEncoder")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinoadafruitnrf52/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi@1.70201.0/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/lora-relay-v2/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
